headline: Nvidia, Qualcomm, and More Could Gain From Growing Autonomous Vehicle Market, BofA Says
summary: Nvidia, Qualcomm, and Caterpillar are some of the stocks Bank of America analysts said could benefit from a growing autonomous vehicle market, along with robotaxi makers.
